name: Way of the Passive Fist
description: Way of the Passive Fist is a unique and colorful arcade brawler. Parry, Dodge and Dash to outwit and outlast your enemies on a desolate planet ruled by raiders, mutants and fanatical sun worshipers. It's a new kind of tactical fighting in the licensed arcade brawler for the 90s cartoon you wish existed.
minimum_requirements: OS: Vista, 7, 8, 10 (32 or 64 bit) Processor: 2.0 Ghz dual-core or better Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: Geforce 8800 GTX / Radeon HD 2900 XT or better DirectX: Version 11 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 120 MB available space Sound Card: integrated or better Additional Notes: Vista users: DX10 not supported, DX11 is required.
